name: St. Oberholz
description: A legendary coworking cafe at Rosenthaler Platz, known as Berlinâ€™s original laptop-friendly hub. Two floors with ample space, sockets (especially upstairs), fast wifi, and a vibrant remote work community. The spot buzzes with freelancers, students, and remote teams. Expect decent coffee, snacks, and a relaxed policy for long work sessions.
